patthana8.37:1.1: Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana8.37:2.1: (Paccanīyadukamattāni na vattabbaṁ dhammaṁ pūretuṁ nava nava pañhāni karotu.)
patthana8.37:3.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
